trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a class converts property change events to <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Indica se uma classe converte eventos de alteração de propriedade para eventos <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface is typically implemented together with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> interface and indicates that the list converts property change events to <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface normalmente é implementada junto com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList> de interface e indica que a lista converte os eventos de alteração de propriedade para <xref:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You rarely need to implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface.
trans-unit.target: Raramente você precisa implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> interface.

trans-unit.source: However, for performance purposes, your data source should implement <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> if it provides the functionality described previously, and your data source is interacting with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> component, because this functionality is built into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para fins de desempenho, sua fonte de dados deve implementar <xref:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents> se ele fornece a funcionalidade descrita anteriormente, e sua fonte de dados está interagindo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> componente, porque essa funcionalidade é criada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> object raises <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> gera eventos <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> object raises <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> events when one of its property values changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IRaiseItemChangedEvents" /> objeto gera <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.IBindingList.ListChanged" /> eventos quando um de sua propriedade valores alterações; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.
